name: Past Life Returner
author: Na Min Chae
content: Would you like to reverse time?][All your abilities will be reset.][Please choose the date.]“February 28th, 1985. The day I was born.”Financial power. I will gather all the fortune of the world—and create a monopoly. I will monopolize all the dungeons of the world.I will do this now, while the world is still peaceful...before it all begins.Original Webtoon:Daum, KakaoPage Official Translations:Simplified Chinese, Japanese
